text: Yaaba is a 1989 Burkinabé Swiss French family drama movie directed by Idrissa Ouedraogo and starring Noufou Ouédraogo, Fatimata Sanga, Roukietou Barry. It was distributed by New Yorker Films. ==Other websites== * * Category:1989 drama movies Category:1980s family movies Category:Burkinabé movies Category:French family movies Category:French drama movies Category:German family movies Category:German drama movies Category:Swiss drama movies Category:Movies directed by Idrissa Ouedraogo Category:Movies set in Burkina Faso
title: Yaaba
